job.title: Machine Learning Engineer - Marketing
job.description: ltpgta leading tech company in boston is looking for experienced data scientists to join their team as a lead data scientist here you will enhance customer experience and drive business you will work on customer facing data problems and develop machine learning models put into productionltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt ltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtyou willltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtwork across teams to drive algorithmic decision makingltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtbuild and extend machine learning frameworks for scalable model training and deploymentltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtserve as a technical leader for members of your teamltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt ltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtabout youltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt years in industry as a data scientist machine learning engineer or software developerltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtadvanced degree in a quantitative fieldltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtstrong python programmingltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtability to build and deploy advanced machine learning softwareltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtstrong communication skills ability to communicate with business leadersltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtinterest in deploying machine learning models as a scalable serviceltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt ltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtif this sounds like you please apply to learn more references will be collected upon contactltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtsthree us is acting as an employment agency in relation to this vacancyltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltpgt ltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltstronggteoe statement ltstronggtspecialist staffing group is an equal opportunity employer all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin disability or veteran statusltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt ltbrgtltbrgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltspangtltemgtltstronggtto find out more about huxley please visit wwwhuxleycomltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltemgtltspangtltpgt
